queries.query: select count(distinct pr.patient_hid) as v1 from procedures pr, concept c, patient p, encounter e where pr.procedure_uuid = c.concept_uuid and pr.patient_hid = p.patient_hid and pr.encounter_id = e.encounter_id and p.gender = 'F' and c.name = 'Colposcopy' and pr.diagnosis_code= 'N87.0' and month(pr.start_date) = month(':paramStartDate:') and year(pr.start_date) = year(':paramStartDate:') and e.facility_id = ':paramFacilityId:';
